main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified flying objects reported in Clairton, Pennsylvania on June 8, 1964.
interesting points: A witness observed a bright, elongated object that hovered at 1,000 feet for 15 minutes before disappearing., Another witness reported bright round lights in a horizontal row moving rapidly and silently., Mr. John C. Hicks saw a bright red, pulsating light hovering at 1,000 feet before it accelerated and vanished., The objects exhibited unusual behavior such as zig-zag movement and breaking into pieces., The sightings were reported around the same date and involved different witnesses with varying descriptions.
sighted object: Unidentified flying objects, including a bright spherical object and bright lights in the sky
witness description: Local residents including Mr. Lloyd L. Flinn and Mr. John C. Hicks
